Interface GraphSearcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DijkstraGraphSearcher

    public interface GraphSearcher
    Graph searcher - finds path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Long findPath(ModelNode origin, ModelServerNode target, SimulationTask task, long sTime, java.util.List<ModelNodeConnection> path, SimulationType simType)
      Find path from origin node origin to target node target with best metric value.
      GraphMetric getMetric()
      Get metric used to find paths.

    • Method Detail

      • findPath

        java.lang.Long findPath(ModelNode origin,
                        ModelServerNode target,
                        SimulationTask task,
                        long sTime,
                        java.util.List<ModelNodeConnection> path,
                        SimulationType simType)
                 throws NotMountedException
        Find path from origin node origin to target node target with best metric value.
        Parameters:
        origin - origin node
        target - target node
        task - currently simulated task
        sTime - simulation time
        path - will contain found path
        simType - simulation type
        Returns:
        found path metric value
        Throws:
        NotMountedException - thrown when target does not have object of task mounted.

      • getMetric

        GraphMetric getMetric()
        Get metric used to find paths.
        Returns:
        metric
